alert.note: Alert for Kemper; Lauderdale; Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Scott (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 14 at 11:54PM CDT until June 15 at 12:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM CDT FOR LEAKE...NEWTON...SOUTHERN KEMPER...NORTHERN SCOTT...SOUTHERN NESHOBA AND LAUDERDALE COUNTIES... At 1154 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Suqualena, or 10 miles west of Meridian, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Nellieburg around 1200 AM CDT. Meridian around 1205 AM CDT. Marion around 1210 AM CDT. Zero around 1215 AM CDT. Toomsuba and Alamucha around 1225 AM CDT. Kewanee around 1230 AM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Kemper; Lauderdale; Leake; Neshoba; Newton; Scott
